pr_title: Default to saving checkbox values as a group of obs

timeline.message: Default to saving checkbox values as a group of obs if checkbox does not have concepts

timeline.bodyText: This should be checked at options level and not at the checkbox level. Usually the options are mapped to concepts
timeline.author: githengi

timeline.bodyText: I think that this should be mutually exclusive. Either save the list of checked options in one obs, or an obs for each selection, however not both
timeline.author: githengi

replies.bodyText:
That is what is happening currently (it's mutually exclusive).
However, for assured backward compatibility, it may actually make sense to have both.
replies.author: vincent-karuri

timeline.message: Pull openmrs entity from both the parent widget and each checkbox option
Ignore failing test - it calls an external service that is currently down
